about_the_game:
Peekaboo — A Cross-Platform Hide & Seek Online Game


Players are divided into two teams: Props and Hunters.

The Props task is to hide among other objects so that the hunters can not find them.
Props are able to take shape of any object. Controls use realistic physics.
On each map a lot of unique objects: from small items like doughnuts and fruit, to large ones — like boxes and barrels.

Hunters are armed with special guns and must find all the hidden players among other objects within the time limit.



Each player had unique skills that can help them win the game:
Props can become invisible and create doubles to trick hunters.
Hunters use a special radar to search for hidden props, and also throw bombs and set traps.



Each round, objects on the map change randomly.
This makes the gameplay more interesting!



The game is Cross-Platform, which allows you to play on the same game server from different devices: PC, Android (iOS Support will come in the near future)!

Invite friends and join players from all over the world to play Hide and Seek together!
detailed_description:
PC VERSION WITH BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS


About the Game

Peekaboo — A Cross-Platform Hide & Seek Online Game


Players are divided into two teams: Props and Hunters.

The Props task is to hide among other objects so that the hunters can not find them.
Props are able to take shape of any object. Controls use realistic physics.
On each map a lot of unique objects: from small items like doughnuts and fruit, to large ones — like boxes and barrels.

Hunters are armed with special guns and must find all the hidden players among other objects within the time limit.



Each player had unique skills that can help them win the game:
Props can become invisible and create doubles to trick hunters.
Hunters use a special radar to search for hidden props, and also throw bombs and set traps.



Each round, objects on the map change randomly.
This makes the gameplay more interesting!



The game is Cross-Platform, which allows you to play on the same game server from different devices: PC, Android (iOS Support will come in the near future)!

Invite friends and join players from all over the world to play Hide and Seek together!
name: Peekaboo Lite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 5600+ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 4870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 / AMD FX series or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 6790
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Peekaboo — A Cross-Platform Hide & Seek online game. Players are divided into two teams: Props and Hunters. Props hide, taking the form of objects and adopting their physical properties, and hunters try with all their might to find them.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
